text:
Hey <@U02H4RZA7CG> sorry for the delay in answering here.

> *Can I link the demo image url in templates and modules from my demo site?*
For this one, are you referring to the `screenshotPath:` variable in the template annotations?

> *About the submit theme step, first i need to submit the theme in HubSpot asset marketplace then create a project in Devpost with the same name, video, image preview, demo url, descriptions and submit right?*
Correct, you need to submit to both the HubSpot Asset Marketplace and also the Devpost site.

> *Upload theme to HubSpot asset marketplace, i see HubSpot have 2 way to upload theme (Upload theme file, and HubSpot CLI to upload)*
> *Can i upload theme by click Settings icons -> Website -> Themes -> Upload theme or use HubSpot CLI to upload?*
I would recommend using the CLI to upload the theme to your HubSpot portal and then when submitting to the Asset Marketplace, you should be able to chose your theme from there and continue with the submission process.
the first question not about screenshot part. i mean demo image for demo site
